p: In another study, black garlic, another popular product prepared through garlic fermentation, was compared with fresh raw garlic regarding its immunostimulatory effects on macrophages. While fresh garlic could significantly improve the phagocytic activity of macrophages and production of cytokines, black garlic showed only negligible effects on these parameters. This significant variation is attributed to the different polysaccharides in the two extracts, specifically fructans which are degraded in black garlic ( Li etÂ al., 2017).
